bookTitle: St. Francis of Assisi: Passion, Poverty and the Man who Transformed the Catholic Church

questions.question: Who received the dream that Francis only had two more years to live?
For what reason did Cardinal Hugolino summon Francis to Rieti?
questions.correctAnswer: He encouraged Francis to receive medical treatment to help him regain his eyesight
distractors: To discuss the future of the Franciscan order
To receive the cardinal's blessing before death
To help write the final rule
To meet with the Pope one last time
To settle disputes among the friars

questions.question: What was the outcome of the medical treatment?
questions.correctAnswer: The treatment was primitive and was of no help for his eye condition

questions.question: What did Francis predict about Cardinal Hugolino before he left the Rieti valley?
questions.correctAnswer: That he would one day become pope, which came true on March 19, 1227
distractors: That he would die within the year
That he would join the Franciscan order
That he would be betrayed by enemies
That he would perform a great miracle
That he would build a great basilica

questions.question: Where did Francis stay when he returned from the Rieti valley? Why was this significant?
questions.correctAnswer: In a hut next to the Church of San Damiano, San Damiano was where he first had heard God's voice asking him to rebuild the church
distractors: At the Portiuncula where the order began
In his childhood home in Assisi
At the hermitage on Mount Laverna
In the leper hospital where he first served
At the bishop's palace where he renounced his father

questions.question: What famous prayer did Francis write while staying in San Damiano even though his body was full of pain?
When Francis said 'Let us begin again to serve the Lord God, for up to now we have made little progress,' what does this reveal about his attitude?
questions.correctAnswer: That he was always looking to serve God in new ways
distractors: That he felt he had failed in his mission
That he wanted to start a new religious order
That he regretted his past choices
That he doubted God's love for him
That he was dissatisfied with the friars

questions.question: How did Francis arrive at St. Mary of the Angels, the Portiuncula for the last days of his life?
questions.correctAnswer: On a stretcher carried by brothers
distractors: In a cart pulled by oxen
Carried in a litter by soldiers

questions.question: What did Francis want his brothers to always be faithful to after his death?
questions.correctAnswer: To poverty, to the Roman Church, to the gospel

questions.question: What was Francis' final admonition to his brothers after consoling them about his coming death?
questions.correctAnswer: I have done what is mine; may Christ teach you what is yours
distractors: Follow the rule and you will find peace
Love God and serve the poor always
Keep the faith and never give up
Preach the gospel to all nations

questions.question: Who declared Francis a saint only two years after his death, and placed the first stone of the basilica built in his honor?
